participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and spirited, Amina has a passion for life and finds joy in dancing. She carries the weight of her past but remains hopeful for the future.
participant_1.background: now i live in the united states. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a. i like to dance.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Caring and dedicated, James is thrilled about becoming a father and is excited to take on new responsibilities in his life. He values family above all.
participant_2.background: i work at a school. i am expecting triplets in three months. i just moved into my first home. i recently moved to this country. a already have a step children.
